Smithing chest
Type: Container

You found this heavy metal anvil-shaped box in the blazing furnace while smelting your ores. Who would just leave it there?

Smithing chest is an openable treasury item. It can drop while doing Smithing activities, and can be obtained from some other sources. These Chests are the only way to obtain some Smithing based Equipment. They can have the odds of finding them increased with the Chest Finding equipment attribute.

Loot Tables

These are the sub-tables for the various materials, coins, and items that can come from these chests.

These treasury items take 4 independent loot rolls when they are opened.
